>
[Unconventional Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=78) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 58 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Unconventional Weaponry](/Feats.aspx?ID=72); trained in the weapon you chose for Unconventional Weaponry

</column>

---

You’ve continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapon you chose for [Unconventional Weaponry](/Feats.aspx?ID=72).
